title: Espresso
description: A concentrated and strong coffee, prepared by forcing hot water through finely ground coffee beans. It has an intense flavor and a robust body.

title: Americano Coffee
description: A smooth and light beverage made by diluting a single espresso with hot water. It is less intense than an espresso but retains its distinctive flavor.

title: Coffee Latte
description: A mixture of espresso and steamed milk, with a small amount of foam on top. It is creamy and smooth, with a balance between coffee and milk.
